Header: Several areas to expect heavy showers today
Content: Met Department has announced that fairly strong winds about 40-50 kmph can be expected in the Western, Central, Southern, Sabaragamuwa, Uva and North-western provinces of the island. Showers or thundershowers will occur at times in the Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and in the Galle, Matara, and Kaluthara districts. Several spells of showers will occur in the North-western province and in the Colombo, Gampaha and Hambantota districts. Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in the Mullaitivu and Trincomalee districts in the afternoon. Fairly heavy falls about 50mm can be expected at some places in the Ratnapura, Kegalle, Kandy, Galle, Matara and Kaluthara districts.
